Module jGame
Package jGame.core.entity.render

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.entity.render.Sprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class acts as a way of displaying custom entity visuals, supporting animations for said entities.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • Sprite

  • Method Details

    • loadAnimationSprite

      public void loadAnimationSprite​(java.io.InputStream[] inputs) throws java.lang.Exception
      Loads all animation frames for using by the sprite when animating. Every InputStream in inputs is closed after its image has been loaded.
      Parameters:
      inputs - an array of InputStream objects containing image data
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if we try to change the type (static/animated) of this sprite
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      ImageIO.read(InputStream)

    • loadSpriteImage

      public void loadSpriteImage​(java.io.InputStream input) throws java.lang.Exception
      Loads an image to render on top of the entity this sprite is associated to.
      Parameters:
      input - an InputStream object containing image data
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if we try to change the type (static/animated) of this sprite
      Since:
      1.0.0
      See Also:
      ImageIO.read(InputStream)

    • render

      public java.awt.Image render()
      Returns the image to be rendered.
      Returns:
      this sprite's image, if it is static, or the current animation frame, if it is animated
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • getBounds

      public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
      Returns the bounds of the sprite. Mainly used for collision detection by Entity.tick().
      Returns:
      the bounds of this sprite
      Since:
      1.0.0
